entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , 100 Mile House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:15 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain mixed with snow this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
